context: Mid-sized agricultural cooperative facing increasing climate variability and drought conditions, considering investment in irrigation technology and drought-resistant crops

request.purpose: Implement climate adaptation technologies including drip irrigation systems and drought-resistant seed varieties
request.justification: Recent drought reduced yields by 35%, threatening cooperative viability and member livelihoods

decision_process.outcome: Feasibility confirmed with projected 25% yield improvement
5-year payback period identified, grant funding available

business_impact.expected_outcome: Improved drought resilience and 20-30% yield stabilization

lessons_learned: Early stakeholder engagement critical for agricultural technology adoption, climate adaptation investments require comprehensive risk assessment
